Traits.Name: Beyond Death
Traits.Description: When defiance activates, roll a d6. On a 4+, the Immortal immediately regains defiance. Attacks with True Strike bypass this trait.

Traits.Name: Aura of Immortality
Traits.Description: While Immortal is undefeated, relict within range 2 of it cannot be reduced past 1 HP. If the Immortal gains life link, this aura turns off.
